recipesJson.name: Java Cigar
recipesJson.author: GotxFuel
recipesJson.description: Ever had a rocky patel cigar by Drew Estates well I believe you will like this one. It needs 3-4 weeks steep but was really good as an S&V

reviews.text: Well done! This is a great mix. Cocoa, tobacco, and vanilla are all nicely balanced, nothing over the top. The overall flavor is medium strong, and thereâ€™s a mild smokiness to it. The second time I mixed it I added 0.75% FA Walnut, which I find to go very well with it. Most of the mixes I vape are tobaccos, and this is one of the best.
